exclusive_offers: Exclusive offers for members only, coupons, exciting premiums with proof of purchase, special offers
instructions: Fill out the information card, sign it, and mail it back
opportunity_message: Don't miss this opportunity to join Salem's Most Preferred Club. It's our way of thanking you for choosing Salem. And the only way to get these exclusive Membership benefits.

offer_details.offer_restriction: Offer restricted to smokers 21 years of age or older

joining_instructions: To join the club and to be eligible to start receiving special offers, complete and sign the original information card.
certification: I certify that I am a smoker, that I am 21 years of age or older, and that I want to receive offers.
surgeon_general_warning: Smoking by pregnant women may result in fetal injury, premature birth, and low birth weight.
